name: Deep Blue Requiem
description:
Deep Blue Requiem (Still in Progress) Role: Lead Programmer, Level Designer, Post-processing and Visual Effects Designer, Cutscene Designer Engine: Unity 3D Controls:

WASD to move

Shift to run

E to interact

Tab to open/close inventory

Esc to open/close pause menu

Other controls according to in-game tutorials

Deep Blue Requiem is a puzzle horror RPG game in the future world of 24th century. This world is full of natural disasters, and most of the land is covered by the uprising sea level, therefore humans can only live separately on islands and communicate with others by simple computer systems. 

The protagonist Atlas lives alone in a four-story mansion, and works as an investigator for missing people cases. But during his investigation, his mansion sinks into mysterious black water, and when he wakes up again, he finds himself still in his mansion, but all furniture are all upside down, and the environment outside window shows that he is in deep sea.

There are different gameplay and levels in each of the undersea levels, and after finishing each level, players can continue into the next floor, which is the next level as well. As players go deeper, more truths about this world and the sea will be revealed.
